title: Mr Ducky has no love for AR Urf :(
body:
Mr Ducky has found him self leaving a game of URF. MR Ducky hasn't left a game in a very long time and he does it in URF, because of the one sided  game play just like in ARAM. I wish I could enjoy this game mode but you really can't enjoy getting face rolled by Orianna {{champion:61}}  when you are Illaoi {{champion:420}} , says Mr Ducky. MR Ducky would be fine with it if it wasn't Summoner Rift but instead it was The Howling Abyss.  Mr Ducky will still play League, he enjoys it ^.^ but he will only be playing ARAM because honestly, its more fun than AR URF. Riot have found a way to turn a diamond into coal :( gg Riot 1/10 {{item:3070}} 

Mr DUcky is curious to see what people think is better AR URF or Classic URF

replies.body: the only people who think classic urf is better are those who would cycle through the same 5 or so OPs every game

atleast they played champions they wanted to play. You know what. I don't want to play soraka, or thresh, or lulu, or zac, or shyvana, or singed, or fizz, or zed etc. I want to play a champion that I WANT to play and I will have fun even if I lose.
Yeah I agree I would rather play against the same champs every game and get to choose who I want to play because random isn't fun when you don't enjoy all champs
I think both are pretty bad, they should allow all champions to be selectable, then randomise those selections, then make teams mirror for a fair match.
i think they both get old quick
ARURF is cancerous. No idea why the keep bringing it back.
